import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const BASE_URL = 'https://album-cover-search.herokuapp.com/api/album-cover' const App: React.FC = () => { const [artist, setArtist] = useState('') const [album, setAlbum] = useState('') const [covers, setCovers] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const handleSubmit = async (event: React.FormEvent) => { event.preventDefault() try { setLoading(true) const response = await axios.get(`${BASE_URL}?artist=${encodeURIComponent(artist)}&album=${encodeURIComponent(album)}`) setCovers(response.data) } catch (error) { console.error('Error:', error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } return ( <>

Album Cover Search

setArtist(event.target.value)} />
setAlbum(event.target.value)} />

{ loading ? (
Loading...
) : (
{ covers.map( (cover, index) => (
) ) }
) }
) } export default App
